ModMetaData.name: [KYD] More Condiments
ModMetaData.author: Kayedon
ModMetaData.description:
Adds several new condiments for use in Vanilla Cooking Expanded or Sauced Meal recipes, to add some more uses to a few items I find myself drowning in.
If Vanilla Factions Expanded - Insectoids is loaded, you can turn 10 Royal Jelly into Royal Jelly Preserves. Royal Jelly Preserves give +3 mood and +30% immunity gain speed for 6 hours.
If Vanilla Factions Expanded - Vikings is loaded, you can turn 10 Honey into Honey Syrup. Honey Syrup gives +6 mood.
Also includes uses for alcohol in Vanilla Brewing Expanded and the bones from Rim of Madness - Bones!
Got some more condiment ideas? Let me know in the comments!
